A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is a terrible movie\, at least\, for causing such a divide in the sw fanbase. Usually\, when a product is good\, you don´t see so much people arguing about it. For example\, how many have you see arguing Pizza is bad?. This is for those that give this 5 stars\, don´t be blind and hypocrites. This is a product\, we are the consumers\, and there´s certainly something wrong with it
